title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: I Am Legend
description: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

title: Three Hundred
description: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

title: The Avengers
description: Earths mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanitys survival.

title: Game of Thrones
description: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, plans to return after thousands of years in the North.

title: Vikings
description: The world of the Vikings is brought to life through the journey of Ragnar Lothbrok, the first Viking to emerge from Norse legend and onto the pages of history - a man on the edge of myth.

title: Gotham
description: The story behind Detective James Gordons rise to prominence in Gotham City in the years before Batmans arrival.

title: Power
description: James Ghost St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering for the citys elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

title: Narcos
description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his familys financial future.

title: Doctor Strange
description: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant and conceited surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
description: The Rebellion makes a risky move to steal the plans to the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

title: Assassins Creed
description: When Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, he discovers he is a descendant of the secret Assassins society.

title: Luke Cage
description: Given superstrength and durability by a sabotaged experiment, a wrongly accused man escapes prison to become a superhero for hire.

title: The Killer
description: A skilled assassin finds himself in a deadly game of cat and mouse after a botched job threatens to expose his hidden life.

title: Havoc
description: After a drug deal goes wrong, a detective finds himself in the middle of a conspiracy involving corrupt politicians and criminal syndicates.

title: The Old Guard 2
description: The immortal mercenaries return as they face new threats and challenges while trying to protect their secret.

title: A Knives Out Mystery
description: Detective Benoit Blanc is back to solve a new case involving a wealthy family with deep secrets and hidden agendas.

title: A Family Affair
description: A wealthy family reunion is disrupted by hidden agendas and unspoken tensions as secrets come to light.

title: The Out-Laws
description: A mild-mannered bank managers life is turned upside down when his in-laws turn out to be notorious criminals.

title: The Promised Land
description: A dramatic tale of a family struggling to save their ancestral land from corporate exploitation amidst personal turmoil.

title: The Girl in the Mirror
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who starts seeing disturbing reflections in mirrors that lead her to uncover dark secrets about her past.

title: The Last Voyage of the Demeter
description: A terrifying voyage about the ill-fated journey of the ship Demeter, which is transporting Dracula? coffin from Transylvania to England.

title: The Night Agent
description: A thrilling story of an FBI agent caught in a web of conspiracy involving the highest echelons of government.

title: The Secret Garden
description: A reimagining of the classic story about a young orphan who discovers a magical garden that changes her life.

title: The Haunting of Bly Manor
description: A chilling tale of a young woman who takes a job as a nanny in a mysterious manor with a dark history.

title: The Last Kingdom
description: A historical drama following the rise and fall of a king in ancient times as he battles internal and external forces.

title: The Immortal
description: A suspenseful drama about a man who discovers he has lived for centuries and must confront his past to save his future.

title: The Great Escape
description: An action-packed story about a group of prisoners of war planning a daring escape from a high-security camp.

title: Echoes
description: A tense thriller about a detective who uncovers a series of crimes linked to a secretive and wealthy family.

title: Undercover
description: An exhilarating spy film about an undercover agent infiltrating a dangerous criminal organization.

title: The Ghost Writer
description: A suspenseful narrative about a ghostwriter who uncovers disturbing secrets about his client while writing their memoirs.
